help-file.title: SOULRENDER
help-file.content:
A Soulrender is a multi-class Shaman/Reaver.
Notes on Soulrender: Shamans use totems, and memorize spells without spellbooks. Reavers memorize and require spellbooks. If you start as a Shaman, you will memorize spells, but you will no longer need totems or spellbooks, for ANY of your spells. If you start as a Reaver, you will also memorize spells, but you will need spellbooks for all of your reaver AND your shaman spells.
